ygData.subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars
ygData.msgSnippet: UnderT, the reason Wolfgang is in a torture chamber and Zardus isn t is because Wolfgang came in after almost two months of not RPing and tried to order people

UnderT, the reason Wolfgang is in a torture chamber and Zardus isn't is 
because Wolfgang came in after almost two months of not RPing and tried to 
order people around, Zardus was active those two months and managed to 
recruit most of the alliance members.

::Zardus::

Zardus looks at the Ark from behind several trees. He, Nemesis, and the 
Oblitercons got onto the floating island several minutes before, and had 
quickly found the Ark.

"Allright," Zardus says quietly, "Let's go. But remember, don't damage the 
Ark too much. We'll attack and leave."

With that, Zardus jumps out from behind the trees, firing his launcher at a 
bot with its head down (Cyber Claw).
